Class ShardEntityInterceptor

java.lang.Object
  org.hibernate.EmptyInterceptor
      src.groovy.com.jeffrick.grails.plugin.sharding.ShardEntityInterceptor

class ShardEntityInterceptor
extends org.hibernate.EmptyInterceptor

This class is used to synchronize the transaction in the shard database with the one in the index database

author:
Jeff Rick Date: Aug 11, 2009 Time: 3:00:03 PM
